name: Mobilengine
overview:
Mobilengine is a customizable mobile business reporting app for every business need. You can easily report and receive company data on your mobile phone wherever you are. You can start using it instantly since mobilengine comes with several ready-made forms and summary reports.

Mobilengine makes it easy for companies with mobile staff to replace paper forms with more efficient mobile forms for smartphones. Since no programming is required, average computer users can create custom forms for mobile data entry for any use, in almost any industry. Nowadays more and more enterprises require mobile reporting from employees who work outside the office. Market leading companies support their mobile employees with mobile phone based data inquiry that allows highly secure remote access to internal company data. Systems which are capable of electronic report filling, ordering, and filtering as a basic tool of a modern office, however automated custom executive summary report generation with geo localization, and photo attachment could be a competitive advantage in many industries.

Mobileninge mobile front-end runs on iPhone and Windows Mobile phones. While the back-end is web based.

Mobilengine’s development center is in Hungary, EU.

milestones.description: T-Systems Hungary (sister company of T-Mobile and KFKI) starts distribution of Mobilengine to enterprise and mid-sized clients.
